missing.game.characters

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • missing.game.characters.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, WorldTile.TileObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Merchant, Player

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorldTile.TileObject, java.io.Serializable
    This provides the skeleton implementation of the Objects within the world. This should be extended by Player classes and NPCs.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
